gibbonID(input.dir="/Users/denaclink/Library/CloudStorage/Box-Box/gibbonRSampleFiles/MultipleSoundClasses",output.dir="/Users/denaclink/Library/CloudStorage/Box-Box/gibbonRSampleFiles/MultipleSoundClassesThumbnails/",win.avg='standard',add.spectrograms=TRUE,min.freq=400,max.freq=1600,class='no.clustering')
